edu.ou.asgbook.rbf.RadialBasisFunction

edu.ou.asgbook.rbf.RadialBasisFunction Class Reference

Finds best fit of a spatial grid to a sum of Gaussians when the centers and sigmas of the Gaussians are known. More...

 Provide the center locations and this function will fill in the optimal amplitude.
static void main (String[] args)

Detailed Description

Finds best fit of a spatial grid to a sum of Gaussians when the centers and sigmas of the Gaussians are known.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

static double [] edu.ou.asgbook.rbf.RadialBasisFunction.fit ( LatLonGrid  data,
Pixel[]  center,
double[]  sigmax,
double[]  sigmay 
) [static]

Provide the center locations and this function will fill in the optimal amplitude. 

00019                                                                                                  {
00020         // inv( transpose(H) * H) * transpose(H) * data
00021         int p = data.getNumLat() * data.getNumLon();
00022         int m = center.length;
00023         Matrix H = new Matrix(p, m);
00024         Matrix ycap = new Matrix(p, 1);
00025         for (int i=0; i < p; ++i){
00026             int x = i / data.getNumLon();
00027             int y = i % data.getNumLon();
00028             for (int j=0; j < m; ++j){
00029                 double xdist = x - center[j].getX();
00030                 double ydist = y - center[j].getY();
00031                 double xnorm = (xdist*xdist) / (sigmax[j] * sigmax[j]);
00032                 double ynorm = (ydist*ydist) / (sigmay[j] * sigmay[j]);
00033                 double wt = Math.exp(-(xnorm + ynorm));
00034                 H.set(i,j, wt);
00035             }
00036             ycap.set(i, 0, data.getValue(x, y));
00037         }
00038         // H.print(H.getColumnDimension(), H.getRowDimension());
00039         
00040         Matrix HT = H.transpose();
00041         Matrix HTH = HT.times(H);
00042         Matrix HTHinv = HTH.inverse();
00043         Matrix HTHinvHT = HTHinv.times(HT);
00044         
00045         return HTHinvHT.times(ycap).transpose().getArray()[0];
00046     }

00052         double[] sigmax = new double[] { nrows/12, ncols/8 };
00053         double[] sigmay = new double[] { nrows/8, ncols/12 };
00054         LatLonGrid m = DataSimulator.simulateData(centers, sigmax, sigmay, nrows, ncols);
00055         
00056         System.out.println("Created data of size " + m.getNumLat() + "x" + m.getNumLon());
00057         double[] weights = fit( m, centers, sigmax, sigmay );
00058         for (int i=0; i < weights.length; ++i){
00059             System.out.println("Actual: " + centers[i].getValue() + " RBF: " + +weights[i]);
